original_text: For many days after this, Jesus appeared to his disciples. The people who had earlier travelled with him from Galilee to Jerusalem saw him. They are now telling the people of Israel all about it.
korean_text: 갈릴리로부터 예루살렘에 함께 올라간 사람들에게 여러 날 보이셨으니 그들이 이제 백성 앞에서 그의 증인이라

sentences.original_text: The people who had earlier travelled with him
from Galilee to Jerusalem saw him
They are now telling the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 지금 이스라엘 백성에게 말하고 있습니다
